info.name: Equity Crowdfunding with NestJS + PostgreSQL + MongoDB
info.description: Comprehensive API collection for equity crowdfunding platform built with NestJS, supporting dual database architecture (PostgreSQL & MongoDB) with JWT authentication, campaign management, user management, and file uploads.
